name: Resident
tagline: The Proptech Company Provides Property Management Services
description:
Resident - a proptech platform that aims to optimize management resources for rental real estate businesses.

Resident offers a comprehensive solution to help real estate business units overcome the recent challenge and increase their profit about 20% per year. Growing up from the pandemic, Resident also continues to accelerate with more than 17,000 customers in the management ecosystem.

Resident Management system for landlords and business units: Integrating many features to help landlords easily manage their rental system on just one platform, anytime, anywhere.

Resident also gets the support of experts, entrepreneurs; Technology researchers with PhD AI / Big Data / Computer Science degree.
